author: hwright
msg: Update the recommended apr and apr-util versions.  This comes as a response to
CVE-2009-???? which is the result as a bug in apr, but manifests itself as a
DoS attack against public Subversion mod_dav_svn servers.
Update recommended versions of apr and apr-util.

author: neels
msg: Fix segfault from r37795 and add regression test.
The segfault occurs when svnsync encounters deletion of an
New dump file for svnsync cmdline tests that involves the removal of
(delete_svn_props): New test for this segfault, using the dump file.
The dump file above was created with the lines:
svn ci -m "adding file with prop '$propname'" WC
svn ci -m "removing prop '$propname' from file" WC

author: stsp
msg: * CHANGES: Fix description of issue #3347 fix.

author: hwright
msg: Add another condition to an sqlite where clause.  There's not point to doing
the filtering manually when we can let sqlite do it for us.
(statements.STMT_SELECT_REPOSITORY): Select the repo id by uuid and root.
(create_repos_id): Bind the extra select argument, and remove the filtering
